input.sentences: we had a busy day checking out the architecture of this city .
looking up | the brick detailing is interesting of this old post office .
outside we see the old lighting set up . these line the street to keep it lit up at night .
the church steeple in the background is traditional | and plays bells on every hour .
at the end of our tour of the architecture | we went to blow off some steam at the adventure park in the next town .
output.sentences: On my day off, I went to the city where many tourists were checking out the sites.
The post office was a hit for it's architecture, and intricate detailing.
The street was set so that lights would come on at night.
For now we could see the traditional building churches, and the biggest steeple on our way to see a couple of plays.
Much bigger than my town, it's a good place to tour, and let off some steam.
